alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane; McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:55PM CDT until July 28 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... De Kalb County in north central Illinois... Kane County in northeastern Illinois... Southeastern McHenry County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lakewood to near Genoa to near Kirkland, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elgin, DeKalb, Bartlett, Crystal Lake, Carpentersville, St. Charles, Algonquin, Lake in the Hills, Huntley, Geneva, Sycamore, Campton Hills, Genoa, Shabbona, South Elgin, Cary, Sugar Grove, Pingree Grove, Gilberts and West Dundee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
